entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
